1.46.text: Most machines of any degree of complexity, that we opt to live around.

5.74.text: Are offered to us with an instruction manual.

8.54.text: A guide to how the unfamiliar machine works.

11.90.text: What we can except from it!

13.18.text: How to get the best out of it!

14.90.text: And how to interpret its signals.

17.98.text: that it would be so much easier and less enraging

22.34.text: when we have taken some time systematically and patiently

29.00.text: And yet one area, when we tend not to have manuals to read

32.08.text: is when it comes to other people and their functioning.

39.58.text: We going to relationship without any real sense

42.16.text: of where the others peculiarities will lie

47.42.text: as if operating another person might be an intuitive skill

51.42.text: will just pick up along the way.

53.38.text: It can take a painful decade or more

56.30.text: to work out the very basics.

59.24.text: Mostly, human machines work in extremely odd ways.

62.80.text: And yet tend not to explain, the origins of their madness.

66.50.text: For example: They don't calmly lay out

70.44.text: have given them a disposition to shout at airport,

76.02.text: or to be shifty in owning up to debts.

78.48.text: We must work backwards, from outward behavior,

82.40.text: without any help, from the machines themselves.

86.64.text: Sometimes, the signals are just completely confusing.

89.60.text: "Fuck off, I really don't want to see you."

93.20.text: I am so worried you don't want me

95.30.text: and I am getting in early with my revenge.

102.02.text: I am trying to control you procedurally

104.18.text: because I fell so out of touch with you emotionally.

107.22.text: We would safe so much time

109.26.text: if we knew how to give one another manuals, early on.

113.90.text: when I am hurt I go cold

116.10.text: or I am especially prone to be subservient,

120.00.text: or I get brutal when I am at most vulnerable.

122.60.text: or I feel a need to talk about other possible lovers,

125.70.text: because I feel so unattractive to you deep down.

132.06.text: are usually discovered in a heat of conflicts.

135.06.text: In context where they would have wounded the other person.

138.94.text: will be denied to the good will that might have ensured that could be forgiven.

142.90.text: Many of the difficult patterns of behavior of human machines

146.92.text: have very sympathetic points of origin.

149.70.text: But, once they have caused the partner humiliation

152.70.text: they are unlikely ever to be looked upon charitably.

156.56.text: We don't need people to be perfect,

159.52.text: We only need them to be able to see their faults,

162.52.text: to teach us about them, when we are unthreatened

165.48.text: and to apologize for the difficulties they causes in good time.

170.00.text: In other words, the greatest, most loving and luxurious gift

174.06.text: any partner could ever give another

178.56.text: To their own rather tortured, odd

181.46.text: but ultimately, always really rather lovable soul.
